maqras.text: Qalat Rusuluhum 'Afi Allahi Shakkun Fatiri As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Yad`ukum Liyaghfira Lakum Min Dhunubikum Wa Yu'uakhkhirakum 'Ila 'Ajalin Musammaan Qalu 'In 'Antum 'Illa Basharun Mithluna Turiduna 'An Tasudduna `Amma Kana Ya`budu 'Aba'uuna Fa'tuna Bisultanin Mubinin

Qalat Lahum Rusuluhum 'In Nahnu 'Illa Basharun Mithlukum Wa Lakinna Allaha Yamunnu `Ala Man Yasha'u Min `Ibadihi Wa Ma Kana Lana 'An Na'tiyakum Bisultanin 'Illa Bi'idhni Allahi Wa `Ala Allahi Falyatawakkali Al-Mu'uminuna
Wa Ma Lana 'Alla Natawakkala `Ala Allahi Wa Qad Hadana Subulana Wa Lanasbiranna `Ala Ma 'Adhaytumuna Wa `Ala Allahi Falyatawakkali Al-Mutawakkiluna
Wa Qala Al-Ladhina Kafaru Lirusulihim Lanukhrijannakum Min 'Arđina 'Aw Lata`udunna Fi Millatina Fa'awha 'Ilayhim Rabbuhum Lanuhlikanna Az-Zalimina
Wa Lanuskinannakumu Al-'Arđa Min Ba`dihim Dhalika Liman Khafa Maqami Wa Khafa Wa`idi
Wa Astaftahu Wa Khaba Kullu Jabbarin `Anidin
Min Wara'ihi Jahannamu Wa Yusqa Min Ma'in Sadidin
Yatajarra`uhu Wa La Yakadu Yusighuhu Wa Ya'tihi Al-Mawtu Min Kulli Makanin Wa Ma Huwa Bimayyitin Wa Min Wara'ihi `Adhabun Ghalizun
Mathalu Al-Ladhina Kafaru Birabbihim 'A`maluhum Karamadin Ashtaddat Bihi Ar-Rihu Fi Yawmin `Asifin La Yaqdiruna Mimma Kasabu `Ala Shay'in Dhalika Huwa Ađ-Đalalu Al-Ba`idu
Alam Tara 'Anna Allaha Khalaqa As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđa Bil-Haqqi 'In Yasha' Yudh/hibkum Wa Ya'ti Bikhalqin Jadidin

Wa Barazu Lillahi Jami`aan Faqala Ađ-Đu`afa'u Lilladhina Astakbaru 'Inna Kunna Lakum Taba`aan Fahal 'Antum Mughnuna `Anna Min `Adhabi Allahi Min Shay'in Qalu Law Hadana Allahu Lahadaynakum Sawa'un `Alayna 'Ajazi`na 'Am Sabarna Ma Lana Min Mahisin

Wa Qala Ash-Shaytanu Lamma Quđiya Al-'Amru 'Inna Allaha Wa`adakum Wa`da Al-Haqqi Wa Wa`adtukum Fa'akhlaftukum Wa Ma Kana Li `Alaykum Min Sultanin 'Illa 'An Da`awtukum Fastajabtum Li Fala Talumuni Wa Lumu 'Anfusakum Ma 'Ana Bimusrikhikum Wa Ma 'Antum Bimusrikhiya 'Inni Kafartu Bima 'Ashraktumuni Min Qablu 'Inna Az-Zalimina Lahum `Adhabun 'Alimun
Wa 'Udkhila Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Jannatin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Khalidina Fiha Bi'idhni Rabbihim Tahiyatuhum Fiha Salamun
Alam Tara Kayfa Đaraba Allahu Mathalaan Kalimatan Tayyibatan Kashajaratin Tayyibatin 'Asluha Thabitun Wa Far`uha Fi As-Sama'i
Tu'uti 'Ukulaha Kulla Hinin Bi'idhni Rabbiha Wa Yađribu Allahu Al-'Amthala Lilnnasi La`allahum Yatadhakkaruna
Wa Mathalu Kalimatin Khabithatin Kashajaratin Khabithatin Ajtuththat Min Fawqi Al-'Arđi Ma Laha Min Qararin
Yuthabbitu Allahu Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Bil-Qawli Ath-Thabiti Fi Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Fi Al-'Akhirati Wa Yuđillu Allahu Az-Zalimina Wa Yaf`alu Allahu Ma Yasha'u
